title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.2 - Development, operation and maintenance agreements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 42.2 - Development, operation and maintenance agreements

State Regulations

The Department may award and enter into one or more
agreements, contracts, or leases, including ground or development leases, with
one or more parties to provide for the development, operation and/or
maintenance of the facilities referred to in section
42.1
of this Part. Except for
agreements, contracts or leases with State agencies, public authorities, municipalities, or local convention and visitor bureaus, any such development, operation and/or maintenance agreements, contracts or leases awarded or entered
into pursuant to this Part shall be awarded to the responsible party or parties
based upon the department's evaluation of the quality and value, including
return to the State, of proposals submitted to the department in response to a
publicly advertised request for proposals. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
42.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
